text:
Two persons were killed on Sunday when an avalanche hit a place near Sadhna Pass in north Kashmir’s Kupwara district, a police official said.

“Two civilians, who were working as Beacon [Border Roads Organisation] labourers, came under an avalanche during snow clearance operation at Khooni Nallah near Sadhna Pass,” he said. The official said rescue teams swung into action and pulled out the duo who were buried under a huge mound of snow.

However, both succumbed during treatment in a hospital, he said. — PTI
title: 2 die in Kashmir avalanche
